User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://safetylens.pro/sitemap.xml

# Block access to admin areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /dashboard/private/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /pricing
Allow: /features
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact
Allow: /blog/

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
